mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select plan_used.plan_used_idx idx,plan.plan_name subject,plan_used.plan_start writedate,plan_used.plan_type gender,used_vip.plan_end deadline,used_vip.used_vip_floor grade,trunc(used_vip.plan_end-sysdate) com_idx from plan_used,used_vip,plan where plan_used.plan_used_idx=used_vip.plan_used_idx and plan.idx=plan_used.plan_idx and plan_used.member_idx=#{idx} order by plan_used.plan_used_idx desc) a) b where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
mapper.insert: insert into used_vip values( used_vip_idx.nextval, plan_used_idx_se.currval, #{member_idx}, sysdate+#{plan_end}, #{used_vip_floor} )
